title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Jan 22 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Wednesday, 22 January 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On the Wednesday, January 22 transmission of The Alex Jones Show, Jones runs down the list of government sponsored terror attacks tailor-made to justify the War on Terror and the continued violation of civil liberties. 

Alex also covers 'philanthropist' and eugenicist Bill Gates' two cents on government spying and why he thinks it's not so bad, and multi-millionaire Kevin O'Leary's celebration of the fact that half of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s population is impoverished. 

On today's show, Alex welcomes former Marine, political activist and fellow radio host Adam Kokesh to discuss his experience within the prison industrial complex immediately following his decision to uphold the Second Amendment inside the nation's capitol.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
